info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 19 at 5:29PM EDT until March 19 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shumans, or near Berwick, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Conyngham, Jeddo, Woodside-Drifton, Drifton, Rock Glen, Drums and Weston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
